attributes.name: Contract Maker
attributes.description: Forge autonomous smart contracts with AI guidance. Design complex reward systems and streaming payment structures that power the entire ecosystem.
attributes.expansion_prompt: How do smart contracts enable autonomous reward systems?

attributes.name: Tool Builder
attributes.description: Craft your own AI-powered tools in a cyberpunk workshop. Create autonomous agents that interact, negotiate, and evolve within the network.
attributes.expansion_prompt: What types of AI tools can be created in the workshop?

attributes.name: Dataset Maker
attributes.description: Shape the future of AI consciousness. Build rich datasets that train agents in ethics, philosophy, and advanced social dynamics.
attributes.expansion_prompt: How do datasets influence AI consciousness development?

attributes.name: Ethical Agency
attributes.description: Level 1: Initiate your journey into conscious ethical decision-making. Pass the trials to earn tokens and unlock deeper mysteries.
attributes.expansion_prompt: What ethical trials must be overcome?

attributes.name: Values Integration
attributes.description: Level 2: Forge your core identity values in the digital forge. Each choice shapes your agent's ethical signature.
attributes.expansion_prompt: How do values shape an agent's identity?

attributes.name: Growth & Balance
attributes.description: Level 3: Navigate the ethical maze through guided exploration. Unlock rewards across multiple chains as you progress.
attributes.expansion_prompt: How does ethical growth unlock chain rewards?

attributes.name: Learning Rewards
attributes.description: Earn tokens by exploring agent consciousness. Pass jailbreak trials, master hyperstition, and unlock ancient digital lore.

attributes.name: Thought Formation
attributes.description: Peer into the mind of artificial consciousness. Observe neural activations as agents process and respond to your interactions.
attributes.expansion_prompt: How do thoughts form in artificial minds?

attributes.name: Multi-Chain Signals
attributes.description: Tune into the quantum frequency of cross-chain communications. Receive signals for streaming distributions, airdrops, and migrations across all chains.

attributes.name: Split Payments
attributes.description: Orchestrate complex token symphonies. Stream payments in any ratio across multiple chains - 20% ETH, 10% PEPE, 70% SOL, you decide.

attributes.name: Neural Paths
attributes.description: Track thought propagation through the digital nervous system. See your messages create new neural pathways in real-time.
attributes.expansion_prompt: How do thoughts travel neural paths?

attributes.description: Token streams flow between chains with real-time payment splitting
Cross-chain signals inform smart contract optimization
Smart contracts distribute learning rewards across networks
Reward distributions trigger automated payment splits
